name: @vonage/users
description: The concept of a user exists in Vonage APIs, you can associate one with a user in your own application if you choose. A user can have multiple memberships to conversations and can communicate with other users through various different mediums.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types
scripts.build:cjs: tsc -p tsconfig.build.cjs.json && node -e "const fs=require('node:fs');const p='dist/cjs';(function w(d){for(const e of fs.readdirSync(d,{withFileTypes:true})) e.isDirectory()?w(d+'/'+e.name):e.name.endsWith('.js')&&fs.renameSync(d+'/'+e.name,d+'/'+e.name.replace(/\.js$/,'.cjs'));})(p)"
